randoop.generation

Class GrtNumericFuzzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • randoop.generation.GrtFuzzer
      • randoop.generation.GrtNumericFuzzer

  • public final class GrtNumericFuzzer
extends GrtFuzzer
    Fuzzer for primitive numeric values and char. Samples a Gaussian delta g ~ N(0,sigma^2) (sigma configurable via GenInputsAbstract.grt_fuzzing_stddev), and adds it to the original.

      • fuzz

        public Sequence fuzz(Sequence sequence)
        Description copied from class: GrtFuzzer
        Appends fuzzing statements to sequence. If the type is unsupported by this fuzzer, the implementation throws an exception.
        Specified by:
        fuzz in class GrtFuzzer
        Parameters:
        sequence - the sequence whose last value will be fuzzed
        Returns:
        a new sequence with additional fuzzing statements, or the original sequence if no fuzzing was performed

      • sampleMutatedValue

        private static java.lang.Object sampleMutatedValue(Type type,
                                                   java.lang.Number orig)
        Sample g ~ N(0,sigma^2), add to orig.doubleValue(), and cast to the right type. Does not return Number because the result may be a Character.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the value to fuzz
        orig - the original value
        Returns:
        the fuzzed value
